problems.title: Add Bold Tag in String (String Algorithm)
problems.description: Problem Statement You are given a string s and an array of strings words. You should add a closed pair of bold tag and to wrap the substrings in s that exist in words. If two such substrings overlap, you should wrap them together with only one pair of closed bold-tag. If two substrings wrapped by bold tags are consecutive, you should combine them. Return s after adding the bold tags.
problems.examples: Sample Input abcxyz123 abc 123 Sample Output abcxyz123 Explanation: The two strings of words are substrings of s. Sample Input aaabbb aa b Sample Output aaabbb Explanation: "aa" and "b" overlap and are consecutive, so they are combined.
problems.constraints:
1 <= s.length <= 1000
0 <= words.length <= 100
1 <= words[i].length <= 1000
s and words[i] consist of English letters and digits.
All the values of words are unique.
